page.title: 03BURGHFIELD-"NUCLEAR VALLEY"
page.content: The Atomic Weapons Research Establish- ment (AWRE) at Aldermaston,a large employer for the area,performs highly secret research in the nuclear field. The Royal Ordnance Factory (ROF) at Burghfield was built during World War II to produce ammunition and has been used in that capacity ever since.It is also involved in the assembly of nuc- lear war-heads and missiles. As a result of all this,the area has become a focus of contention for the pro- and anti-nuclear lobbies.Mrs J. Ruddock,former chairperson for the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament (CND) ,lives in Burghfield Common.In 1983 there was a major demonstation against the presence of the various bases.Pro- testors unsuccessfully blockaded the ROF and RAF Greenham and formed a human chain between the two,involving some 80,000 people.
